biotools.summary:
A novel Machine Learning-based application for automated analysis of two-dimensional NMR spectra in NMR fragment-based screening.

A fast and efficient multi-spectrum anlayzer for 2-D NMR Fragment Screening based on SMOTE-ENN machine-learning discriminator. - rubbs14/CSP-Analyzer.
